title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added note about SAML IdP certificate expiration behavior and troubleshooting steps for `digest mismatch` errors.
Clarified that GitHub Actions secrets are unavailable for Dependabot-triggered workflows.
Added GPT-5 models to Azure OpenAI rate limits table.
Updated REST API and GitHub Apps permissions paths from `/organizations/` to `/orgs/` for consistency.
Fixed typos and improved SAML configuration instructions.
summary:

- Clarified that GitHub Actions secrets are unavailable for Dependabot-triggered workflows.
- Added GPT-5 models to Azure OpenAI rate limits table.
- Updated REST API and GitHub Apps permissions paths from `/organizations/` to `/orgs/` for consistency.
- Fixed typos and improved SAML configuration instructions.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:

- Added note about SAML IdP certificate expiration behavior and troubleshooting steps for `digest mismatch` errors.
- Clarified that GitHub Actions secrets are unavailable for Dependabot-triggered workflows.
- Added GPT-5 models to Azure OpenAI rate limits table.
- Updated REST API and GitHub Apps permissions paths from `/organizations/` to `/orgs/` for consistency.
